settings.faq_question: WHAT IS THE LIFE EXPECTANCY OF THE EYELINER & THE EYELASHES?
settings.faq_answer: The Glamnetic Eyeliner is reusable up to 100 times. If you care for the eyelashes properly, they can last over 35+ times. Make sure you clean the magnets on the lash after every use and to magnetize it back into lash tray! Avoid water contact with the lashes as they will lose their curl and shape.

settings.faq_question: DOES THE LINER COME WITH THE LASH?
settings.faq_answer: Our liner does not come with the lash but if you buy a kit (which offers a bulk discount for getting 2 or more lashes) it does come together!

settings.faq_question: WHAT’S IN THE EYELINER, IS IT SAFE & IS IT CRUELTY FREE?
settings.faq_answer:
The Glamnetic Eyeliner ingredients are all commonly found in common makeup and skincare products & are cruelty free. The added ingredient that makes the eyeliner work is iron oxide. See below for the breakdown and the safety level of all ingredients as cited in EWG's Skin Deep Cosmetic Database. In addition, Princeton Consumer Research independently studied the effects of prolonged magnetic lash use in healthy female subjects, and not a single adverse reaction was found. Having Magnetic and iron contents near your eyes productes no long term negative consequences. However, for the health and safety of our customers, we do not recommend any eye products to anyone with pre-existing eye conditions.
*** We strongly suggest that you try our products on a small patch of skin (other than the intended location), to test for reactions first. We also urge everyone to review our product ingredients first to avoid sensitivities.

settings.faq_question: HOW CAN I MAKE SURE THAT THE GLAMNETIC LASHES FIT MY EYESHAPE?
settings.faq_answer: We offer 12 different lashes styles with varying thickness and length--able to create styles ranging from natural to super glam looks. There are 5 small magnets on each of them capable of being cut down to fit any eye shape and sizes. Make sure no raw edges are at the edge of the lash after cutting.

settings.faq_question: CAN I WEAR OTHER MAGNETIC LASHES WITH YOUR PRODUCTS?
settings.faq_answer: Yes. Our eyeliner works with any & all magnetic lashes!

settings.faq_question: CAN I WEAR MASCARA WITH MY GLAMNETIC MAGNETIC LASHES?
settings.faq_answer: Yes, we recommend you applying our glamnetic mascara on your eyelashes, and then curling with our glamnetic eyelash curler before applying Glamnetic lashes so your natural eyelashes are more blended in with the lashes! We don’t recommend putting mascara directly on the mink lashes as it will distort the shape and form of the lash and shorten the lifespan of the lash. We would love to see the looks you come up with using our lashes. Feel free to show us by tagging our Instagram @Glamnetic in your photos, and hash tagging #glamgang #beGlamnetic. We’d love to feature what you come up with!

settings.faq_question: HOW DO I MAKE MY MAGNETIC EYELASHES STICK TO THE MAGNETIC LINER BETTER?
settings.faq_answer: You may have remnants of mascara or eyeliner stuck onto the tiny magnets. If you notice this, you can scratch it off with your nail or take makeup remover on a q-tip and gently wipe it off the strengthen the magnetic pull on the eyelashes. Also make sure you have applied a thick and even enough coat of eyeliner and that it's  FULLY dried before magnetizing lashes! Otherwise liner will stick to the magnet more than your eyelid so very important its dried before magnetizing.

settings.faq_question: HOW DO I REMOVE & CLEAN MY LASHES?
settings.faq_answer: Removal is way easier with our magnetic liner than the conventional eyelash glue method. Simply pull the false eyelash off and away from the eyelid and there will be no tugging or pulling of your natural eyelashes, but your glamnetic lashes will be removed :) If you notice clumps from the eyeliner or mascara on the magnets, gently scratch it off with your nail on each of the magnets. To clean the liner off your eyelid, it will dissolve in the hot shower and clean off any remianing residue, use waterproof makeup remover or any oil (coconut, olive, etc)

settings.faq_question: WHAT ARE THE LASHES & YOUR BRUSH MADE OF?
settings.faq_answer: All our magnetic lashes are mink with small magnets glued on them. We also have just released a Faux mink lash style which is made from high quality synthetic fibers.  Our brush is made from plastic fiber.

settings.faq_question: WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY ORDER?
settings.faq_answer: All of our orders are received by and delivered out of our warehouse within 24 hours typically unless there is a major flood in volume of orders. Shipping usually takes about 2-7 business days to deliver from the time it leaves our facility.

settings.faq_question: IN WHICH CASE AM I NOT ELIGIBLE FOR A BOSS BABE COMMISSION CREDIT?
settings.faq_answer: Codes for Boss Babe are only considered Valid if they are not leaked to a coupon site. And codes are not valid during our sales periods.

settings.faq_question: WHERE ARE YOUR PRODUCTS MADE?
settings.faq_answer: We work with a high quality factory in china that utilizes bright spacious facilities, modern methods, provides comfortable conditions and convenience for local communities. Our full time staff work closely with our factory to assure rigid standards of quality, environment and safety.

settings.faq_question: HOW DO I CANCEL MY ORDER?
settings.faq_answer: All orders are processed within 24 hours or less. If you would like to edit or cancel your order, you can contact us at support@glamnetic.com or DM us @glamnetic within 30 minutes of order placement to cancel your order.

settings.faq_question: MY TRACKING NUMBER IS NOT SHOWING ANY INFORMATION.
settings.faq_answer: All customers receive tracking information via email as soon as it is available. In many cases USPS will have delayed tracking updates, approximately 24-48 hours from the original scan of your shipment. You can always send us an email to support@glamnetic.com or DM us for quicker response if you require assistance with tracking your order.

settings.faq_question: DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?
settings.faq_answer: Yes we do! Please check the rates as they are calculated at checkout based on country! Also check our shipping info in our footer!

settings.faq_question: Questions and Feedback?
settings.faq_answer: We welcome your questions, comments, and concerns about privacy. Please feel free to send any comments and/or concerns regarding this policy to support@glamnetic.com.

settings.faq_question: CAN I CHANGE PAYMENT METHODS?
settings.faq_ans:
If you need to change which payment method is used for future installments, follow these steps to associate a different card with a given order. This will cause all further installments for that order to be billed against your new card.

1. Log into the Customer Portal at https://customer.quadpay.com.

2. Go to the Orders Page and click View Order for the order you would like to change.

3. Click Edit next to the payment card.

4. Select the card you’d like to use, and click “Use this Card”.

settings.faq_question: CAN I GET A REFUND?
settings.faq_ans:
Yes! If you return your order, you will receive a refund. Just like with a regular purchase!
In the case of a full refund, as soon as we are notified of the return, you are refunded the amount you've paid to-date and QuadPay cancels all future payments.
Remember, if you have only made one installment payment, we can only refund what you have paid, not the entire amount of the original purchase.

settings.faq_question: CAN I PARTIALLY REFUND QP?
settings.faq_ans: If the refund is partial (for example, you’ve only returned part of an order) we will start by reducing your last installment by that amount, then if it is more than that, we will deduct it from your last and second last installment - and so on.

settings.faq_question: CAN I PAY OFF QP EARLY?
settings.faq_ans: Yes, log in to QuadPay’s Customer Portal and choose the order you would like to pay off early. You can access the portal at this link:https://customer.quadpay.com.

settings.faq_question: DOES QP HAVE A SPEND LIMIT?
settings.faq_ans: QuadPay uses an automated system that analyzes various factors to determine approval and spend limits. *Not every order is approved for QuadPay. QuadPay will charge 25% of the purchase amount at the time of the transaction. If the customer doesn’t have this available, then the order won’t go through. If a customer is a repeat purchaser and has made all their payments on time, then QuadPay will be more likely to give them a higher spending limit.

settings.faq_question: HOW CAN I CHECK MY QP ORDER?
settings.faq_ans: Log in to QuadPay’s customer portal through the following link: https://customer.quadpay.com/login

settings.faq_question: HOW DO I SIGN UP FOR QUADPAY?
settings.faq_ans: Sign up when you reach the checkout page!

settings.faq_question: HOW DOES QP NOTIFY ME?
settings.faq_ans: QuadPay sends out payment reminders via SMS and e-mail before each payment is due.

settings.faq_question: WHAT IF I WILL MISS A PAYMENT?
settings.faq_ans: Simply make sure to notify QuadPay to avoid a late fee if your payment method is not up-to-date or if you can’t make your next payment. You may contact QuadPay by clicking here. Please note that QuadPay will determine whether or not a payment date change can be honored.

settings.faq_question: WHAT INFO DOES QP NEED?
settings.faq_ans: To sign up, all QuadPay needs to know is your name, address, date of birth, US mobile number and a US debit or credit card.

settings.faq_question: WHAT IS QUADPAY?
settings.faq_ans: QuadPay is an installment payment platform that lets you pay for your purchase using a credit or debit card. QuadPay automatically splits the purchase amount into 4 payments, every two weeks. QuadPay lets you buy now and pay over an extended period of time!

settings.faq_question: WHEN IS MY QP PAYMENT DUE?
settings.faq_ans: Your first payment of 25% of the total purchase price will be made at the time of checkout. The three remaining payments will be billed automatically, every two weeks from your first payment date.

settings.faq_question: WHO CAN USE QUADPAY?
settings.faq_ans: Anyone with a US debit or credit card.

settings.faq_question: WHY WOULD I USE QUADPAY?
settings.faq_ans: By using QuadPay you have the opportunity to split your Glamnetic purchase into four (4) easy installments and pay for your order over time, instead of all-at-once.
